alert.note: Alert for San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Saba County through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of strong thunderstorms just south of Richland Springs, and near Algerita. The storms were moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Saba, Richland Springs, Algerita, Skeeterville, Sloan, Harkeyville, Locker and Spring Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
